text: Don’t give a shit OR fuck about my dad because he’s the reason my brain is fucked up and why I’m taking Escitalopram for severe anxiety, Bupropion XL for my severe depression and Risperidone for my schizophrenia :red exclamation mark:
Started taking it at night with my escitalopram & risperidone since it makes me sleepy. Then when my alarm goes off in the morning for work I don’t feel sleepy anymore.
day 3 of antidepressants...escitalopram to be exact :man facepalming medium skin tone:
Again that’s difficult logistically. I’m a prude and I am on Escitalopram
